title: Detox Tea for Body Balance
description: This organic tea is a special blend of Dandelion Leaf & Root and Blessed Thistle which allows for a gradual cleansing process instead of using harsh cleansing products & diuretics. It is naturally decaffeinated.
cleaned_text: be harsh and disruptive to the body. This Detox Tea is a body balancer without the strong cleansers and diuretics. This blend allows detoxing to be a gradual cleansing process. Detox Tea For Body Balancing does exactly that - gives you the benefit of a thorough detox without harsh side effects while cleansing your system. Herbs include dandelion leaf and root, and Blessed Thistle, herbs that are just as effective today as ever. Caffeine free, organic, herbs are cultivated without chemicals.
